text: Emad Mohamed Abd El Naby Ibrahim Moteab, commonly known as Emad Moteab (born 20 February 1983) is an Egyptian retired professional footballer. He has played for Al Ahly and the Egypt national team. ==International== :Source: Egypt national team Year Apps Goals 2004 1 1 2005 11 6 2006 11 4 2007 8 1 2008 16 8 2009 6 3 2010 8 2 2011 1 0 2012 5
